rows.label: tev101201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Fortun how to stop the Definian threat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Fortun about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh, very well. If you do exactly as I ask,
I suppose I could tell you what you wish to know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0002
rows.name: First, I need you to execute that traitor, Erio.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0003
rows.name:
She must be made to pay for all of the countless
torments and insults she has inflicted upon her mother
and queen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0004
rows.name:
Then, with great care and proper respect,
you will take me back to my daughters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0005
rows.name:
At that point, I would be delighted to tell you what you
wish to know. Heh heh heh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0008
rows.name:
I am sure my daughters are quite busy hunting down
and murdering those responsible for my abduction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0009
rows.name:
Heh. You would be wise to watch your own back.
My daughters could be disguised as anyone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0010
rows.name:
In fact, it is entirely possible that one of your most
trusted and beloved companions has already been
replaced by one of them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0011
rows.name:
How you must regret what you've done! But alas,
the die has already been cast. All you and that traitor
Erio can do now is enjoy what little life you have left![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_SEL2011
rows.name: Try to extract valuable information from Fortun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Fortun about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0021
rows.name:
I hear that many beaporges can be found in the
West Cinderdunes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0022
rows.name: ...There! Isn't that a useful piece of information?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0023
rows.name:
As you can see, I am now fully reformed.
So please take me down from here RIGHT NOW![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0026
rows.name:
Aah! The wind! Please, [ST:playername ]!
You have to save me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0027
rows.name:
I told Erio to take me someplace that would be fit for
a queen...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0028
rows.name: And she abandoned me up here! I can't even move![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0029
rows.name:
Even I might not be able to survive a fall from this
height...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0030
rows.name:
Please, you have to get me down from here!
I promise I won't cause any more trouble for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0031
rows.name: No! Shoo! Do not dare approach me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev101201_MSG0032
rows.name:
Can't you just allow my daughters to kill you with some
measure of grace?[ST:wait ]
